ai.desc: Starts with #wHeadbutt. Afterwards, 40-30-30 split between #wNibble, #wCorrosive #wSpit, and #wHeadbutt. Can't use #wCorrosive #wSpit or #wHeadbutt three times in a row or #wNibble twice in a row (if any of those limits have been reached, 50-50 split between the two other moves). NL NL In the first two normal fights in the act, the middle Hatchling starts with #wJust #wHatched, then 50-50 split between #wCorrosive #wSpit and #wHeadbutt.

ai.desc: Starts with #wBide, then #wEvolve, then repeats #wClaw. NL NL Evolution choices cycle as follows: NL (1) Enrage 2, Ritual 5, or Strength 20 NL (2) Beat of Death 1, Thorns 3, or Burns 4 NL (3) Buffer 5, Metallicize 25, or Max HP 75 NL (4) Frail Pulse, Dazed Pulse, or Abysstouched Pulse 2 NL (5) Artifact 5, Slimy Body, or Invincible 50. NL NL Evolution cycles after the first skip repeat only the first three chocies.
ai.notes: Innate #uBarricade. Starts with 90 block.

ai.desc: Cycles #wGnawing #wCorruption or one of the smaller attacks -> the other option -> #wOpen #wAll #wEyes -> one of the smaller attacks. NL NL The smaller attacks are #wTentacle #wSweep, #wOpen #wLeft #wEye, and #wOpen #wRight, #wEye, and each use of a smaller attack will be different from the most recent smaller attack. Cannot use #wTentacle #wSweep on the first turn.
ai.notes: Status cards from #wOpen #wLeft #wEye go into the draw pile. Status cards from #wGnawing #wCorruption go into the discard pile. Status cards are randomly selected from Drained, Panic, Staggered, Corrupted, and Withering.

ai.desc: Starts with #wScythe. Afterwards equal chance of using each move, but always uses #wScythe if it hasn't been used in the last three moves, can't use #wCall #wProtector if there are 3 or more minions alive, can't use #wScythe or #wCall #wProtector three times in a row, and can't use #wStrengthen #wCarapace twice in a row.
ai.notes: Innate #uPrimeval #uCall. Spawns with 1 #wRoyal #wProtector.

ai.desc: Moves are based on the number of turns since #wDuress or #wHymn #wto #wthe #wVoid were used, with the first turn following the "if 3" logic: NL If 1, 40-60 split between #wOnslaught and #wCorrupting #wTouch. NL If 2, 12.5-12.5-35-40 split bewtween #wDuress, #wHymn #wto #wthe #wVoid, #wOnslaught, and #wCorrupting #wTouch. NL If 3, 25-25-10-40 split between #wDuress, #wHymn #wto #wthe #wVoid, #wOnslaught, and #wCorrupting #wTouch. NL If 4, 50-50 split between #wDuress and #wHymn #wto #wthe #wVoid.
ai.notes: Innate #uThought #uStealer, #uResummon. Slimed status cards go into the discard pile. Dazed status cards go on top of the draw pile.

ai.desc: Starts with #wCrystal #wShard. Afterwards, 75-25 split between #wCrystal #wShard and #wBeam, but cannot use #wCrystal #wShard three times in a row or #wBeam twice in a row.

ai.desc: Uses #w??? until 3 or fewer other crystals are left. After activating, cycles #wCrystal #wSpear -> #wCrystal #wBarrage or #wResonance -> the other. If #uStrength is 0 or below, always uses #wResonance then #wCrystal #wBarrage instead of the other way around.
ai.notes: Innate #uInactive #uCrystal, #uCrystal #uLink 100, #uStrength -5. Mineralize status cards are split between going into the draw and discard piles.

ai.desc: Uses #w??? until 3 or fewer other crystals are left. After activating, cycles #wCrystal #wSpear -> #wCrystal #wBarrage or #wResonance -> the other. If #uStrength is 0 or below, always uses #wResonance then #wCrystal #wBarrage instead of the other way around.
ai.notes: Innate #uInactive #uCrystal, #uCrystal #uLink 100, #uStrength -5. Mineralize status cards are split between going into the draw and discard piles.

ai.desc: Uses #w??? until 3 or fewer other crystals are left. After activating, cycles #wCrystal #wSpear -> #wCrystal #wBarrage or #wResonance -> the other. If #uStrength is 0 or below, always uses #wResonance then #wCrystal #wBarrage instead of the other way around.
ai.notes: Innate #uInactive #uCrystal, #uCrystal #uLink 150, #uStrength -5. Mineralize status cards are split between going into the draw and discard piles.

ai.desc: Follows a complex cycle in which it uses each of its five moves exactly once: NL (1) Uses #wWithering #wStrike. NL (2) 50-25-25 split between #wDark #wBarrier, #wTouch #wof #wSuffering, and #wCircle #wof #wProtection. NL (3) If the last move was #wDark #wBarrier or #wCircle #wof #wProtection, 50-50 split between #wTouch #wof #wSuffering and #wPoleaxe. Otherwise, 50-50 split between #wDark #wBarrier and #wCircle #wof #wProtection. NL (4) Uses #wTouch #wof #wSuffering if it has not been used yet this cycle, otherwise 50-50 split between the moves not yet used this cycle. NL (5) Uses the last remaining move.
ai.notes: Innate #uArtifact 1, #uChains #uof #uDoom. Withering status cards go into the discard pile.

ai.desc: Follows a complex cycle in which it uses each of its five moves exactly once: NL (1) Uses #wWithering #wStrike. NL (2) 50-25-25 split between #wDark #wBarrier, #wTouch #wof #wSuffering, and #wCircle #wof #wProtection. NL (3) If the last move was #wDark #wBarrier or #wCircle #wof #wProtection, 50-50 split between #wTouch #wof #wSuffering and #wPoleaxe. Otherwise, 50-50 split between #wDark #wBarrier and #wCircle #wof #wProtection. NL (4) Uses #wTouch #wof #wSuffering if it has not been used yet this cycle, otherwise 50-50 split between the moves not yet used this cycle. NL (5) Uses the last remaining move.
ai.notes: Innate #uArtifact 1, #uChains #uof #uDoom. Withering status cards go into the discard pile.

ai.desc: Follows a complex cycle in which it uses each of its five moves exactly once: NL (1) Uses #wWithering #wStrike. NL (2) 50-25-25 split between #wDark #wBarrier, #wTouch #wof #wSuffering, and #wCircle #wof #wProtection. Otherwise, 50-50 split between #wDark #wBarrier and #wCircle #wof #wProtection. NL (4) Uses #wTouch #wof #wSuffering if it has not been used yet this cycle, otherwise 50-50 split between the moves not yet used this cycle. NL (5) Uses the last remaining move.
ai.notes: Innate #uArtifact 1, #uChains #uof #uDoom. Withering status cards go on top of the draw pile.

ai.desc: Starts with #wAnnihilation #wCurse. Afterwards, cycles #wChaos #wBolt -> #wStrength #wfrom #wthe #wVoid -> #wBreath #wof #wDarkness. If the player's #uAbysstouched is 5 or lower, uses #wLesser #wAnnihilation instead of #wStrength #wfrom #wthe #wVoid.
ai.notes: Innate #uArtifact 1, #uAbysstouched #uPulse 1. Corrupted status cards go into the draw pile.

ai.desc: Starts with #wAnnihilation #wCurse. Afterwards, cycles #wChaos #wBolt -> #wStrength #wfrom #wthe #wVoid -> #wBreath #wof #wDarkness. If the player's #uAbysstouched is 5 or lower, uses #wLesser #wAnnihilation instead of #wStrength #wfrom #wthe #wVoid.
ai.notes: Innate #uArtifact 1, #uAbysstouched #uPulse 1. Corrupted status cards go into the draw pile.

ai.desc: Starts with #wAnnihilation #wCurse. Afterwards, cycles #wChaos #wBolt -> #wStrength #wfrom #wthe #wVoid -> #wBreath #wof #wDarkness. If the player's #uAbysstouched is 10 or lower, uses #wLesser #wAnnihilation instead of #wStrength #wfrom #wthe #wVoid.
ai.notes: Innate #uArtifact 1, #uAbysstouched #uPulse 2. Corrupted status cards go into the draw pile.

ai.desc: Follows a long pattern: (1) #wObliterate -> (2) #wCalamity -> (3) #wRavage or #wDamnation -> (4) the other -> (5) #wEmbrace #wthe #wEnd -> (6) #wRavage or #wAll #wIs #wDust -> (7) the other -> (8) #wRuin -> (9) #wRavage or #wAll #wIs #wDust -> (10) the other -> (11) #wRuin -> (12) #wRavage or #wDamnation -> (13) the other -> (14) #wEmbrace #wthe #wEnd -> repeat 12-14. NL NL NL NL Innate #uBeat #uof #uDeath 1, #uEmptiness, #uInvincible 300. Status cards from #wDamnation go into the draw pile. Status cards from #wRuin go into the discard pile. NL NL #wCalamity: the unique debuff applied varies by class. NL #wDamnation: On uses after the first, only gives Overwhelmed. NL #wEmbrace #wthe #wEnd: On uses after the first, only gives Strength (30 on second use, 60 after). NL #wAll #wIs #wDust: Gives Painful Stabs 2 instead of Beat of Death on second use. NL #wRuin: On uses after the first, only gives Overwhelmed.
